dicons and Decepticons, so I put that

d a moment of calm.  So much for that.

ns are at full force, and us with just a

ar that a full sense of calm won't be 
> achieved.  It's up to Rodimus, Lor=
d Elder and myself to get us to that 
> point.  I know we can do it, and if=
 I'm going to pull my weight in this war,

nline, including my sight."

himmer like aquamarines against

s them. Only until his sight is

nated with the same light as the
